sentences.en: The third-quarter results reflect continued improvements in productivity.
sentences.cn: 第三季度的结果反映了生产率的持续提高。

sentences.en: The US trade deficit grew to just under $30 billion in the third quarter.
sentences.cn: 美国的贸易逆差在第三季度增加到恰好低于300亿美元的水平。

sentences.en: The group said results for the third quarter are due on October 29.
sentences.cn: 该集团说第3季度的结果将于10月29日公布。
